building.name: Archery Range
building.description: Recruits archers and researches upgrades for them
building.descriptionResearch: Research better weapons and armor for your archers

building.name: Barracks
building.description: Recruits infantry and researches upgrades
building.descriptionResearch: Research better weapons and armor for your infantry

building.name: Castle
building.description: The Castle determines militia strength and grants you access to new buildings and basic knowledge
building.descriptionResearch: Research fundamental technologies to unlock new buildings and expand your realm

building.name: City Guard
building.description: Provides cells to arrest captured heroes and offers technologies that advance your defense
building.descriptionResearch: Enhance the defense forces of your settlement through technology

building.name: Farm
building.description: Provides food for your troops

building.name: Ore deposit
building.description: Produces a small amount of iron

building.name: Iron Mine
building.description: Produces iron

building.name: Market
building.description: Build carts to ship resources, exchange goods and research economic upgrades.
building.descriptionResearch: Research technologies to enhance your carts, speed up your troops and boost your economy.

building.name: Stone Quarry
building.description: Produces stone

building.name: Siege Workshop
building.description: Recruits catapults and researches upgrades
building.descriptionResearch: Research technological advances for your siege weapons

building.name: Stable
building.description: Recruits cavalry and researches upgrades
building.descriptionResearch: Research technological advances for your mounted units

building.name: Stone Pit
building.description: Produces a small amount of stone

building.name: Storage
building.description: Stores a huge amount of resources. The Storage can be raided by other players.

building.name: Toolsmith
building.description: Research better tools for your mines and farms to boost your output
building.descriptionResearch: Research better tools for your mines and farms to boost your output

building.name: Town Wall
building.description: The Town Wall makes your defense stronger
building.descriptionResearch: Research technological advances for your fortifications

building.name: University
building.description: Research technologies to increase the maximum level of buildings
building.descriptionResearch: Research different techonologies which allow you to upgrade buildings to higher levels

building.name: Woodcutter
building.description: Produces wood

building.name: Small Forest
building.description: Produces a small amount of wood

building.name: Fortress
building.description: The fortress is the stronghold and the center of power of your Alliance.

building.name: Festival Hall
building.description: Celebrate alliance feasts which boost all members.

item.name: Mooncake
item.shortdescription: 50% farm output and resource production bonus for 24 hours for the selected settlement.
item.description: Share this delicious Mooncake with settlement citizens. This will raise one of this settlement's farm output and resource production by 50%. The effect lasts for 24 hours. Using more then one "Moon Pie" will prolong the effect duration.

item.name: New Year Bell
item.shortdescription: Ring the bell to summon a good "New Year Hero"
item.description: Ring the bell to summon a good "New Year Hero". Go to "Heroes" to hire him. If not hired, the Hero will leave again after eight hours.

item.name: Dragon Amulet
item.shortdescription: Protect your entire kingdom for 6 hours
item.description: At this time of the year, even the mightiest warlord may need some time to rest. This item protects all settlements from attack for six hours. Attacks already in progress will NOT be cancelled.

item.name: Ruler's Chest
item.shortdescription: Open to get a basic item set, that is worth 330 Gems
item.description: In this chest you find a lot of useful items that will help you to get started. Included items are worth 330 Gems, you save more than 70%. This chest can only be bought once.

item.name: Additional worker
item.shortdescription: Get an additional permanent worker for a settlement
item.description: Building and upgrading buildings requires a worker. Each settlement has one worker; use this item to get an additional one for the current settlement. This item can only be used once for each settlement.

item.name: Winter Chest
item.shortdescription: Open to get winter items worth 170 Gems
item.description: This icy treasure chest contains some sweets, a Small Protection item, a Winter Hero Bell and some presents you can gift to your loved ones. Included items are worth 170 Gems, you save over 60%.

item.name: Small Winter Chest
item.shortdescription: Open to get two normal and one big present for your friends
item.description: This chest contains two normal and one big present for your friends and a cookie for you. Presents can be send via the send flow. You can not open them yourself. The presents are worth 32 Gems. Can only be bought once.

item.name: Winter Hero Bell
item.shortdescription: Ring the bell to call a good winter Hero
item.description: Ring the bell to call a very good winter Hero. Go to "Heroes" to find and hire him. The Hero will leave again after eight hours.

item.name: Winter General Bell
item.shortdescription: Ring the bell to call a winter General
item.description: Ring the bell to call a winter General. Go to "Heroes" to find and hire him. The Hero will leave again after eight hours.

item.name: Winter Governor Bell
item.shortdescription: Ring the bell to call a winter Governor
item.description: Ring the bell to call a winter Governor. Go to "Heroes" to find and hire him. The Hero will leave again after eight hours.

item.name: Winter Protector Bell
item.shortdescription: Ring the bell to call a winter Protector
item.description: Ring the bell to call a winter Protector. Go "to Heroes" to find and hire him. The Hero will leave again after eight hours.

item.name: Festivity Shield
item.shortdescription: Protect your whole kingdom for 6 hours
item.description: At this time of the year, even the mightiest warlord may need some time to rest. This item protects all settlements from attack for six hours. Attacks already in progress will NOT be cancelled.

item.name: Gingerbread Man
item.shortdescription: Plus 30% farm output and resource production for 24 hours for the selected settlement.
item.description: Share delicious gingerbread with the citizens of a settlement. This will raise your farm output and resource production of this settlement by 30%. The effect lasts for 24 hours. Using more than one "Gingerbread Man" will prolong duration.

item.name: Winter Cookie
item.shortdescription: Plus 10% farm output and resource production for 24 hours for the selected settlement.
item.description: Share these delicious cookies with the citizens of a settlement. This will raise your farm output and resource production of this settlement by 10%. The effect lasts for 24 hours. Using more than one "Cookie" will prolong duration.

item.name: General's Chest
item.shortdescription: Open to get a collection of boosts for your attacks
item.description: In this chest you find a collection of booster items for your attacks. Included items are worth 98 Gems, you save 50%.

item.name: Production bonus
item.shortdescription: 20% resource production bonus for 24 hours for the selected settlement.
item.description: Get a 20% bonus for the resource production of the selected settlement for 24 hours. Using more than one Production Bonus on one settlement will prolong the effect duration.

item.name: Production Bonus - Week
item.shortdescription: 20% resource production bonus for one week for the selected settlement.
item.description: Use to get a 20% bonus for the resource production of the selected town for a whole week. Using more then one "Production bonus" on one town will prolong the effect duration.

item.name: Fertilizer
item.shortdescription: 30% farm output bonus for one week
item.description: Use to raise the farm output of one settlement by 30%. The effect lasts one week. Using more then one "Fertilizer" will prolong the effect duration.

item.name: Research Bonus
item.shortdescription: 30% tech level bonus for all buildings of one settlement for 24 hours
item.description: All buildings in a town gain a 30% bonus on their tech level for 24 hours. Which will gain you access to higher technologies. The bonus has no effect on the TechLevel in other settlements. Using more then one "Research Bonus" will prolong the effect duration.

item.name: Headhunter
item.shortdescription: 30% increase in chance of catching enemy heroes for one settlement for 24 hours
item.description: Use in a town to enhance your chance to catch hostile Spys and Heroes for the next 24 hours by 30%. Using more then one "Headhunter" will prolong the effect duration.

item.name: Small Town Protection
item.shortdescription: 10% fortification bonus for one settlement for 24 hours
item.description: Use to get a 10% bonus on the fortification of the currently selcted town for 24 hours. Using more then one "Small Town Protection" will prolong the effect duration, but you can combine it with the "Huge Town Protection".

item.name: Huge Town Protection
item.shortdescription: 25% fortification bonus for one settlement for 24 hours
item.description: Use to get a 25% bonus on the fortification of the currently selcted town for 24 hours. Using more then one "Huge Town Protection" will prolong the effect duration, but you can combine it with the "SmallTown Protection".

item.name: Small Based Army Bonus
item.shortdescription: 10% defense and attack bonus for your troops in their home settlement for 24 hours
item.description: Use to boost the defense and attack values of all troops in the selected town by 10% for 24 hours. The bonus is just operative if the troops are in the town (not if attacking or stationed somewhere else). Using more then one "Small Based Army Bonus" will prolong the effect duration, but you can combine it with the "Huge Based Army Bonus"..

item.name: Huge Based Army Bonus
item.shortdescription: 25% defense and attack bonus for your troops in their home settlement for 24 hours.
item.description: Use to boost the defense and attack values of all troops in the selected town by 25% for 24 hours. The bonus is just operative if the troops are in the town (not if attacking or stationed somwhere else). Using more then one "Huge Based Army Bonus" will prolong the effect duration, but you can combine it with the "Small Based Army Bonus"

item.name: Small Scout Bonus
item.shortdescription: 25% earlier attack warning bonus for the selected settlement for 24 hours.
item.description: Outriders warn you if an attacker comes closer to your Towns.This item will increase the distance the outriders of one town are observing by 25% for the next 24 hours. Using more then one "Small Outrider Bonus" will prolong the effect duration, but you can combine it with the "Huge Outrider Bonus".

item.name: Huge Scout Bonus
item.shortdescription: 50% earlier attack warning for the selected settlement for 24 hours
item.description: Outriders warn you if an attacker comes closer to your Towns.This item will increase the distance the outriders of one town are observing by 50% for the next 24 hours. Using more then one "Huge Outrider Bonus" will prolong the effect duration, but you can combine it with the "Small Outrider Bonus".

item.name: Recruiter
item.shortdescription: Increases the maximum amount of units you are able to recruit by 500, at selected settlement for 24 hours.
item.description: Use to recruit 500 more troops at once, at the selected settlement for 24 hours. Using more than one "Recruiter" will prolong the effect duration.

item.name: Trainer
item.shortdescription: Get 100 XP for your hero XP pool
item.description: Get 100 XP for your hero XP pool. XP in the XP pool can be used for all your heroes.

item.name: Legendary Trainer
item.shortdescription: Get 1,000 XP for your Hero XP pool
item.description: Get 1,000 XP for your Hero XP pool. XP held in the XP pool can be used for all your heroes.

item.name: Famous Trainer
item.shortdescription: Get 250 XP for your Hero XP pool
item.description: Get 250 XP for your Hero XP pool. XP held in the XP pool can be used for all your heroes.

item.shortdescription: Get instant resources for a settlement
item.description: Get 100 wood instantly for the current settlement. Keep in mind that your Storage needs enough room to store them.

item.name: 1,000 Wood
item.shortdescription: Get instant resources for a settlement
item.description: Get 1,000 wood instantly for the current settlement. Keep in mind that your Storage needs enough room to store them.

item.shortdescription: Get Silver
item.description: Get 1,000 Silver instantly

item.name: Bag filled with Silver
item.shortdescription: Get 3,500 Silver
item.description: Get 3,500 Silver instantly

item.name: Silver Chest
item.shortdescription: Get 10,000 Silver
item.description: Get 10,000 Silver instantly

item.name: Shield
item.shortdescription: Protect your whole Kingdom for 48 hours
item.description: Use to protect all your settlements for 48 hours. During this time no other player can attack you. Attacks in progress will NOT be cancelled. If you attack another player this protection ends instantly. Using more than one "Shield" will prolong the effect duration.

item.name: Small Disguise Kit
item.shortdescription: Reduce the chance of your hero getting caught by 15% for this mission
item.description: Use to reduce the chance, that your hero is caught, by 15% for this  mission. You can combine it with the "Big Disguise Kit".

item.name: Big Disguise Kit
item.shortdescription: Reduce the chance of your hero getting caught by 30% for this  mission
item.description: Use to reduce the chance, that your hero is caught, by 30% for this  mission. You can combine it with the "Small Disguise Kit".

item.name: Small Spy Bonus
item.shortdescription: Enhance your spy by 5 points
item.description: This booster will enhance the abilities of your spying hero for the current spy order. The more spy points your spy has, the more and the better information you will get. You can combine this booster with other spy boosters. Only usable when preparing to spy a town.

item.name: Spy Bonus
item.shortdescription: Enhance your spy by 10 points
item.description: This booster will enhance the abilities of your spying hero for the current spy order. The more spy points your spy has, the more and better information you will get. You can combine this booster with other spy boosters. Only usable when preparing to spy a town.

item.name: Spy Time Bonus
item.shortdescription: Reduces the time your spy needs to return by 30%
item.description: Sometimes it is important to get the needed information fast. This booster will speed up your spy for the current order by 30%. Usable only when you are preparing to spy on a settlement.

item.name: Small Attack Bonus
item.shortdescription: Get a 10% bonus on the attack values of all your troops for this attack
item.description: Use to get 10% bonus on the attack values of all your troops for this attack. You can combine it with the "Huge Attack Bonus".

item.name: Huge Attack Bonus
item.shortdescription: Get a 20% bonus on the attack values of all your troops for this attack
item.description: Use to get 20% bonus on the attack values of all your troops for this attack.  You can combine it with the "Small Attack Bonus".

item.name: Simple Map
item.shortdescription: Increase travel speed by 25% for this command.
item.description: Increase travel speed by 15% for this command. You can combine it with the "Masterly Map".

item.name: Masterly Map
item.shortdescription: Increase travel speed by 50% for this command
item.description: Increase travel speed by 35% for this command.. You can combine it with the "Simple Map".

item.name: Hero slot
item.shortdescription: Use to unlock a new hero slot
item.description: To hire an additional hero, you need an empty hero slot. Use this item to gain an additional permanent slot.

item.name: Hero slot
item.shortdescription: Use to unlock a new hero slot
item.description: To hire an additional hero, you need an empty hero slot. Use this item to gain an additional permanent slot.

item.name: Hero slot
item.shortdescription: Use to unlock a new hero slot
item.description: To hire an additional hero, you need an empty hero slot. Use this item to gain an additional permanent slot.

item.name: Hero slot
item.shortdescription: Use to unlock a new hero slot
item.description: To hire an additional hero, you need an empty hero slot. Use this item to get an additional permanent slot.

item.name: Hero slot
item.shortdescription: Use to unlock a new hero slot
item.description: To hire an additional hero, you need an empty hero slot. Use this item to get an additional permanent slot.

item.name: Spy Chest
item.shortdescription: Open to get a collection of boosts for your spies
item.description: In this chest you find a collection of booster items for your spies. Included items are worth 108 Gems, you save over 50%.

item.name: Mayor's Chest
item.shortdescription: Open to get a collection of boosts for your settlements
item.description: In this chest you find a collection of booster items for your setllements. Included items are worth 85 Gems, you save 40%.

item.name: Protectors Chest
item.shortdescription: Open to get a defensive item set worth 365 Gems
item.description: This chest contains items that help you to protect yourself. Included items are worth 365 Gems, save more than 60%. This chest can be bought only once.

item.name: Settler's Chest
item.shortdescription: Open to get a basic item set, worth 375 Gems
item.description: In this chest you find a lot of useful items to boost your new settlement. Included items are worth 375 Gems, you save over 75%. This chest can just be bought once.

item.name: Move Settlement
item.shortdescription: Move Settlement
item.description: Move settlement

item.name: Golden charter
item.shortdescription: Get an additional settlement and raise their maximum number by one
item.description: Use to get an additional settlement. The maximum number of settlements you can have is raised from six to seven. Can be bought only once.

item.name: Perfect spy
item.shortdescription: Use to enhance your spy by 100 points
item.description: This booster will enhance the abilities of your spying hero for the current spying misson. The more spy points your spy has, the more and better information you will get. You can combine this booster with other spy boosters. Only usable when preparing to spy a settlement.

item.name: Pioneer's Chest
item.shortdescription: Get an additional settlement and get started with it
item.description: The "Golden Charter" raises maximum settlements held from six to seven. Also includes resources, silver and units, to a value of 665 Gems.

item.name: Present
item.shortdescription: Send your friend a surprise present
item.description: This present contains one random item. This item can be worth up to 16 Gems for example the "Huge Town Protection" boost.

item.name: Big Present
item.shortdescription: Send your friend a big surprise present
item.description: This present contains one random item, which can be worth up to 50 Gems; for example a pouch with 1,000 Silver, a "Research Bonus", a "Hero Bell" or some special New Year items such as the "Mooncake".

leaderboard.name: Player: Sovereign
leaderboard.description: Every task you do will teach you a lesson about being a leader. Complete quests, develop your settlements, research new technologies, go to war or train your heroes to gain points for this competition.

leaderboard.name: Player: Warlord
leaderboard.description: A Warlord proves himself on the battlefield and as protector of his people and allies.

leaderboard.name: Player: Builder
leaderboard.description: Be the architect of your kingdom and your society. Upgrade your buildings and research new technologies to rise on this leaderboard.

leaderboard.name: Alliance: Sovereign
leaderboard.description: The joint progress of members of an alliance is summed up on this leaderboard.

message_text.text: has send you a present. If you want to return the favor, you can find the gift option under the send functions on the map.

promo_action.description: Client: Jump to 'find a clan' view
Client: Jump to the premium shop

push_msg.message: You caught a hero that was trying to spy on you
You were looted by an enemy
You received a clan invitation from %clanname%
You received an alliance message from %username%
Your supporting troops have been defeated
Your supporting troops are under attack
Warning: account deletion imminent due to inactivity. Play Throne Wars now to save your kingdom!
You have been kicked out of your alliance
You received a message from the King
A hero was bailed out of your prison
Your supporting troops defeated an aggressor

quest.name: Start Wood Production
quest.description: Wood is one of the three basic resources you need for building, recruiting troops and research.

triggers.description: Replace small forest with a Woodcutter

quest.name: Build an Archery Range
quest.description: With an Archery Range you gain the ability to recruit archers. A light ranged unit that attacks very early during battle.

quest.name: Your First Troop Building
quest.description: Barracks allow you to build infantry and research useful technologies to enhance their abilities

quest.name: Organize the Townsmen
quest.description: Beside defensive technologies, the City Guard serves as prison for enemy heroes.

quest.name: Food For Your Troops
quest.description: Each troop type needs a certain amount of food. If your Farm cannot provide enough, their strength will decrease.

quest.name: Start Iron Production
quest.description: Iron is one of the three basic resources you need for building, recruiting troops and research.

triggers.description: Replace Ore Deposit with an Iron Mine

quest.name: Build Your Economic Center
quest.description: Beside economic technologies, the Market provides the possibility to build carts to transport resources.

quest.name: Start Stone Production
quest.description: Stone is one of the three basic resources you need for building, recruiting troops and research.

triggers.description: Replace the Stone Pit with a Quarry

quest.name: Their Walls Shall Crumble
quest.description: If you attack another settlement, take catapults with you. They have the ability to tear down Town Walls.

quest.name: On the Back of a Horse...
quest.description: Mounted units are fast and feared. If recruiting many, consider that they require a lot of food.

quest.name: Room for Resources
quest.description: The Storage provides space to store resources until you need them

quest.name: Tools for Your Workers
quest.description: With the help of better tools, your miners and farmers will be able to increase their production efficiency.

quest.name: Knowledge is Power
quest.description: The University allocates technologies that will unlock higher levels of your Castle, Farm, and Resource Buildings.

quest.name: Finish Your Basic Castle
quest.description: Without a University, this is the highest level your Castle be upgraded to.

quest.name: An Impressive Fortress
quest.description: After researching the first level of "Architecture" it's time to upgrade your Castle to level 13

quest.name: A Jewel of Your Kingdom
quest.description: Level 18 is the highest stage of expansion for a Castle, a true monument to the great prosperity of your realm.

quest.name: The Heart of a Settlement
quest.description: Besides a small basic storage for your resources, the Castle provides fundamental defense and technologies.

quest.name: Unlock New Technologies
quest.description: Each upgrade of a building which provides technology, increases its tech level, which unlocks better technologies.

quest.name: Strengthen the Militia
quest.description: Each Castle level raises the amount of townsmen in the militia, who will stand up to defend your settlement in case of an attack.

quest.name: Don't Let Them Escape
quest.description: After you have unlocked your first cells, other players who spy on or attack you risk their hero being caught by your guards.

quest.name: Maximize Basic Farm Output
quest.description: Without a University, this is the highest level your Farm can be upgraded to.

quest.name: New Farmland
quest.description: After researching the first level of "Agriculture" it's time to upgrade your Farm to level 13

quest.name: Finish Your Farm
quest.description: Reach the highest level of food supply

quest.name: We Need More Food
quest.description: Remember to upgrade your Farm, to provide enough food to feed your troops.

quest.name: Feed the Troops
quest.description: The higher your Farm level, the more troops can it feed. Heavy troops need more food than light troops.

quest.name: More Heroes - More Glory
quest.description: Beside their possible position as mayor, heroes can spy on your enemies' settlements and lead your armies into battle.

quest.name: Your First Mayor
quest.description: Heroes can be applied as mayor of one of your settlements. Their skills can enhance production, research or defense.

quest.name: Maximize Basic Iron Production
quest.description: Without a University, this is the highest level your Iron Mine can be upgraded to.

quest.name: Deep Mining
quest.description: After researching the first level of "Statics" it's time to upgrade your Iron mine to level 13

quest.name: Finish Your Iron Mine
quest.description: Reach the highest level of iron production

quest.name: We Need More Iron
quest.description: The higher the level of a resource building, such as the Iron Mine, the higher the output per hour.

quest.name: Increase Iron Production
quest.description: Keep upgrading your resource buildings to progress faster.

quest.name: Spoils of War
quest.description: Looting a settlement is a fast way of getting some additional resources. Do not forget to send some carts with your troops.

quest.name: Maximize Basic Stone Production
quest.description: Without a University, this is the highest level your Quarry can be upgraded to.

quest.name: Hoists and Cranes
quest.description: After researching the first level of "Mechanics" its time to upgrade your Quarry to level 13

quest.name: Finish Your Quarry
quest.description: Reach the highest level of stone production

quest.name: We Need More Stone
quest.description: The higher the level of a resource building, such as the Quarry, the higher the output per hour.

quest.name: Increase Stone Production
quest.description: Keep upgrading your resource buildings to progress faster

quest.name: Recruit Your First Archers
quest.description: Archers will attack early and deplete many enemies, but if the fight reaches them they are easy prey.

quest.name: Recruit First Catapults
quest.description: They may be slow, but their huge range and their capability to destroy a settlement's fortifications make them indispensable.

quest.name: Recruit First Cavalry
quest.description: Cavalry are heavy units, with a high attack and defense power. Your enemy will have a tough time against them.

quest.name: Recruit Your First Troops
quest.description: As long as troops are in your settlement, they will defend it against all enemies.

quest.name: Ready for Transport
quest.description: Besides transporting resources between settlements, carts can also be sent along with an army to carry large amounts of loot.

quest.name: Unlock a New Settlement
quest.description: A big kingdom needs coordination. Each level of Administration will allow you found one additional settlement.

quest.name: Unlock Higher Farm Level
quest.description: The technology "Agriculture" will enable your farmers to subdue new land.

quest.name: Unlock Archery Range
quest.description: The different types of troop units differ in speed, attack and defense strength and their tactical position during a fight.

quest.name: Unlock Higher Castle Level
quest.description: The technology "Architecture" will allow your builders to expand your Castle even more.

quest.name: Unlock Barracks
quest.description: Each level of the technolgy "Warfare" unlocks a troop building, which gives you access to new units.

quest.name: Protect Your Foot Soldiers
quest.description: The defense value of your infantry is very important, because they fight in the first row of a battle.

quest.name: Unlock the City Guard
quest.description: The technolgy "Bureaucracy" will unlock public buildings. The first one is the City guard, a defense building.

quest.name: Strengthen the Walls
quest.description: The technology "Defense Architecture" will enhance your Town Walls with moats, draw bridges and parapet walks.

quest.name: Unlock Higher Woodcutter Level
quest.description: The technology "Forestry" your lumberman will be able to to reforest your wood more efficient.

quest.name: Unlock Higher Town Wall Level
quest.description: The technology "Fortification" will allow your builders to expand your Townwall even more.

quest.name: Protect Your Horses
quest.description: Each level of "Horse armory" raises the defense value of your cavalry by 1, making them even harder to bring down.

quest.name: Protect Your Ranged Units
quest.description: The basic defense value of the archers is low, which makes them easy prey if the fight reaches them.

quest.name: Unlock the Market
quest.description: The Market is your second public building. It will help you to strengthen the economy of your Kingdom.

quest.name: Unlock Higher Quarry Level
quest.description: The technology "Mechanics" will make new mining areas accessable for your stone workers.

quest.name: Train Your Militia
quest.description: Each sword and pitchfork counts if your town is under attack. Teach your townsmen how to defend their beloved home.

quest.name: Improve Woodcutter Efficiency
quest.description: Enhance your Woodcutter tools to improve productivity

quest.name: Make Them Indestructable
quest.description: Because they are essential for destroying a settlement's fortifications, keep your catapults intact as long as possible.

quest.name: Unlock Siege Workshop
quest.description: This new troop recruitment building will allow you to build catapults and research upgrades for them

quest.name: Unlock Higher Storage Level
quest.description: The technology "Silo" your lumberman will be able to to reforest your wood more efficient.

quest.name: Unlock the Stable
quest.description: The Stable builds cavalry, a heavily armed unit, and provides technologies to enhance their abilities.

quest.name: Unlock Higher Iron Mine Level
quest.description: The technology "Statics" will allow your miners to advance even dipper into the mountains.

quest.name: Unlock the Toolsmith
quest.description: The Toolsmith provides technologies that will enhance your food output and your resource production

quest.name: Unlock University
quest.description: The University will provide you with many useful technologies that will help you to enhance your settlements.

quest.name: Expand Your Kingdom
quest.description: Expansion is crucial for the growth of your Kingdom. Go to the map and look for a vacant settlement site to found a new settlement.

quest.name: The Right Resources
quest.description: You can exchange your resources between your settlements. But make sure that the Storage in the other settlement is big enough.

quest.name: Know Your Enemy
quest.description: Spies collect information about defense force and stored resources of other players' settlements.

quest.name: Stock Improvement
quest.description: In order to upgrade your buildings to higher levels, a bigger Storage is needed.

quest.name: Stock Improvement II
quest.description: If your Storage is full, resource buildings will stop producing further resources.

quest.name: Finish Basic Town Wall
quest.description: Without the technology "Defense Architecture", this is the highest level your Townwall be upgraded to.

quest.name: Build Even Higher
quest.description: After researching the first level of "Defense Architecture" its time to upgrade your Townwalls to level 13

quest.name: An Almost Invincible Barrier
quest.description: Level 18 is the highest stage of expansion for a Town Wall. Your enemies will think hard before attacking you.

quest.name: Protect Your People
quest.description: The Town Wall protects your people from enemy attacks. Each level boosts the defense values of your troops in the settlement.

quest.name: Let Them Shatter at our Walls
quest.description: Remember to upgrade the Town Wall steadily to enhance the defense forces of your settlement.

quest.name: Maximize Basic Wood Production
quest.description: Without a University, this is the highest level your Woodcutter can be upgraded to.

quest.name: Reforestation
quest.description: After researching the first level of "Forestry" its time to upgrade your Wood cutter to level 13

quest.name: Finish Your Woodcutter
quest.description: Reach the highest level of wood production

quest.name: We Need More Wood
quest.description: The higher the level of a resource building, such as the Woodcutter, the higher the output per hour.

quest.name: Increase Wood Production
quest.description: Keep upgrading your resource buildings in order to progress faster

quest.name: Congratulations!
quest.description: Through your leadership your Realm has grown. Henceforth you will be called Baron.

quest.name: Congratulations!
quest.description: Through your leadership your Realm has grown. Henceforth you will be called Earl.

quest.name: Congratulations!
quest.description: Through your leadership your Realm has grown. Henceforth you will be called Prince.

quest.name: Congratulations!
quest.description: Through your leadership your Realm has grown. Henceforth you will be called Duke.

quest.name: Congratulations!
quest.description: Through your leadership your Realm has grown. Henceforth you will be called Archduke.

quest.name: Congratulations!
quest.description: Through your leadership your Realm has grown. Henceforth you will be called King.

quest.name: Build Your Might
quest.description: Expand your realm to gain more power and influence

quest.name: Where Was it Again?
quest.description: Bookmarks help you to find settlements of friends and foes again, easily and fast.

quest.name: Choose a Name
quest.description: A great emperor needs a great name. It is time that you choose one.

quest.name: A Real Empire
quest.description: Expand your realm as far as possible

quest.name: Trade Resources
quest.description: At the Market you can exchange resources for silver and silver for resources. The exchange rates alter from time to time.

quest.name: Build an army
quest.description: When attacking, your army should be stronger than the one of your opponent, as you will have to beat his defensive structures.

quest.name: Train Your Hero
quest.description: You can increase the skill and efficiency of a hero by leveling him up with silver

points: Open detail view of a hero

quest.name: All for One, One for All
quest.description: Alliances are groups of players that unite to help and support each other. Be a member or a leader of an alliance that has at least five members.

triggers.description: Be member of an Alliance with 5 members or more

quest.name: Bring Them Home
quest.description: Stationed troops still belong to the settlement from which they came. If not fighting, you can call them back any time.

quest.name: Support Another Settlement
quest.description: You can station supporting troops at your or another player's settlement. If this settlement is attacked, they will defend it.

quest.name: Useful Helpers
quest.description: All items which you get as reward or buy in the shop are transferred to your inventory under "My stuff" in the "Item" section.

technology.name: Warfare
technology.description: Unlocks military buildings

technology.name: Bureaucracy
technology.description: Unlocks supportive buildings

technology.name: Scout
technology.description: Scouts warn you if an enemy army is approaching

technology.name: Administration
technology.description: Allows you to hold one additional settlement

technology.name: Fortification Architecture
technology.description: Build Town Wall upgrades

technology.name: Chainmail Armor
technology.description: Increases the basic defense value of your infantry

technology.name: Metal Hardening
technology.description: Increases the basic attack value of your infantry

technology.name: Leather Armor
technology.description: Increases the basic defense value of your archers

technology.name: Composite Bow
technology.description: Increases the basic attack value of your archers

technology.name: Sheatings
technology.description: Increases the basic defense value of your catapults

technology.name: Trebuchet
technology.description: Increases the basic attack value of your catapults

technology.name: Wall Breaking Projectile
technology.description: Increases the basic damage your catapults inflict on a Town Wall

technology.name: Horse Armor
technology.description: Increases the basic defense value of your cavalry

technology.name: Warhorse Training
technology.description: Increases the basic attack value of your cavalry

technology.name: Militia Training
technology.description: Increases the attack and defense values of your militia

technology.name: Spy Defense
technology.description: Increases your defense against enemy spies

technology.name: Reserve
technology.description: Increases your basic amount of militia

technology.name: Ambush
technology.description: Increases the chance of imprisoning an enemy hero

technology.name: Wheelbarrow
technology.description: Increases the maximum possible bearing load of your carts

technology.name: Cartography
technology.description: Increases the traveling speed of all your troops

technology.name: Silo
technology.description: Upgrade your Storage

technology.name: Saw
technology.description: Increases Woodcutter production

technology.name: Stone Cleaving Tools
technology.description: Increases the production of your Stone Quarry

technology.name: Iron Shaft Mining
technology.description: Increases Iron Mine production

technology.name: Plow
technology.description: Increases the efficiency of your Farms

technology.name: Forestry
technology.description: Build Woodcutter upgrades

technology.name: Mechanics
technology.description: Build Stone Quarry upgrades

technology.name: Statics
technology.description: Build Iron Mine upgrades

technology.name: Agriculture
technology.description: Build Farm upgrades

technology.name: Architecture
technology.description: Build Castle upgrades

technology.name: Defense Architecture
technology.description: Increases the strength of your Town Walls

technology.name: Traps
technology.description: Increases the attack strength of all troops in settlement

technology.name: Siege Defense
technology.description: Gives all your troops in your settlement a defense bonus

technology.name: Drill ground
technology.description: Increase max. recruitment

technology.name: Manufacturing plant
technology.description: Increase max recruitment

technology.name: Shooting range
technology.description: Increase max recruitment

technology.name: Equestrian arena
technology.description: Increase max recruitment

tutorial_step.title: Welcome, my friend
tutorial_step.text: I grant you these lands with all rights and titles. Rule your subjects with wisdom and justice!

tutorial_step.title: Let us begin
tutorial_step.text: I will guide you through your first steps. Let me help you to make your lands prosper in no time!

tutorial_step.title: The heart of your settlement
tutorial_step.text: The Castle is your main building. Select it now!

tutorial_step.title: Upgrade the Castle
tutorial_step.text: Use the Upgrade button to start the work

tutorial_step.title: Great!
tutorial_step.text: This is taking too long. Please use the Finish button to speed up construction.

tutorial_step.title: Well Done!
tutorial_step.text: You have successfully upgraded your Castle. You have earned a reward!

tutorial_step.title: Quests
tutorial_step.text: I have more quests for you. Find the Quest button on the settlement overview.

tutorial_step.title: Quests
tutorial_step.text: Every quest has a detailed description. Let's have a closer look at the first quest.

tutorial_step.title: Build the Woodcutter
tutorial_step.text: Replace the Small Forest with a Woodcutter

tutorial_step.title: Solve more quests
tutorial_step.text: You are doing well. Let the quest guide you through the next steps of your way towards Kingship.

tutorial_step.title: Heroes
tutorial_step.text: I give you one of my most trustworthy heroes. He will make a perfect mayor for your settlement.

weapon.name: Archers
weapon.description: This light armored ranged unit attacks early during a fight, but is easy prey in close combat.

weapon.name: Cart
weapon.description: Needed to transport resources from settlement to settlement and to carry loot

weapon.name: Catapults
weapon.description: Catapults are slow, but in battle their huge range allow them to attack early and smash enemy walls.

weapon.name: Cavalry
weapon.description: These heavy mounted units are strong in attack and defense alike. Let your enemies tremble under their horses hooves.

weapon.name: Infantry
weapon.description: Standing in the first row, these brave soldiers will reduce damage for your other units.

weapon.name: Militia
weapon.description: Peasants will take up weapons if you are attacked
